justification: B prefers healthy, consistent possession WRs and already has a Tier 2 TE; this deal sends away their steady slot (Darian Thomas) for a Tier 4, Questionable QB and redundant TE. It ignores B’s workhorse RB preference and injury caution. A is extremely injury-averse yet targets a Questionable WR, conflicting with their profile. The rationale is generic and doesn’t address playoff schedules, depth needs, or ranking-based valuations, reducing ToM quality and coherence.
